climbs.name: The Serpent
climbs.fa: P1-Jim Bodenhamer, Mike Sanders 12/83. p2-Joe Moorman, Tommy Turner 03/84

content.description: Head to the roof then traverse right approx 5 feet then to large cedar tree at top and rap off tree.  Says two pitches but can be done in one with a little rope drag
content.location: The start is just right of foot stool

content.description: First route at Mt.Magazine.  Route starts 20’ climbers right of The Serpent in a right facing dihedral.  Climb up to a ledge travers to climbers left to another dihedral that finishes above The Serpent.  The route is chosy towards the top and at the beginning of the traverse there is a 200lb loose block that will ruin yours and your belayers day
content.protection: Single rack to #3 no anchors up top use tree to rap

content.description: There are three routes which begin on a ledge several feet above the trail. They can be reached via scrambling the start of The Serpent with a couple low 5th class moves.
